In cooperation with Mayor Bowser, SEED DC, along with all public school buildings, will remain closed. No dates have been provided as to when school buildings will be able to reopen.
Please continue to regularly check your email & our website for updates.
Continue to practice social distancing. Be safe. div.a: Belief Statements & Portrait of a SEED Graduate

img.alt: The SEED School of Washington, D.C.

div.a: Belief Statements & Portrait of a SEED Graduate

p.strong: The SEED School of Washington, D.C.

div.p: The nation's first public, charter, college-preparatory boarding school

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-card combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left

img.alt: We are pleased to announce that our high school achieved TIER 1 status for the 2018-2019 school year! -

div.p: We are pleased to announce that our high school achieved TIER 1 status for the 2018-2019 school year!

div.data-block-json: {"blockAnimation":"none","layout":"caption-hidden","overlay":false,"description":{"html":"","raw":false},"hSize":null,"floatDir":null,"html":"<iframe src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/276049142?app_id=122963&wmode=opaque\" title=\"A Journey to College with The SEED Public Charter School of Washington, D.C.\" allow=\"autoplay; fullscreen\" allowfullscreen=\"\" width=\"640\" height=\"360\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe>","url":"https://vimeo.com/276049142","width":640,"height":360,"providerName":"Vimeo","thumbnailUrl":"https://i.vimeocdn.com/video/708479655_640.jpg","resolvedBy":"vimeo"}

div.data-html: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/276049142?app_id=122963&wmode=opaque" title="A Journey to College with The SEED Public Charter School of Washington, D.C." allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen="" width="640" height="360" frameborder="0"></iframe>

div.h3: Our primary mission is to provide an outstanding, intensive educational program that prepares children, both academically and socially, for success in college and beyond.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Our college-preparatory environment challenges all students in small classroom settings and with individualized instruction rooted in our core values. Learn about our model here →

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: With our boarding program, we are not limited by the confines of a classroom. We encourage students to grow through their life experiences as well as their academic experiences. Learn More →

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: SEED graduates are blazing the trail towards college graduation with an army of advocates at their side. Learn more about our college transition and success program here →

figure.blockquote:
“With SEED, we are a whole village raising my
children. We are instilling in my kids that they’ve
never learned enough – there’s always more. SEED kids always have another goal for themselves.”
figure.figcaption: — Ms. Poulson, SEED DC parent (of three) and board member

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none
sqs-block image-block sqs-block-image sqs-col-4 span-4 float float-left
image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: The SEED School partners with My School DC, the Districts common lottery, to collect applications for open seats. The application to apply for the 2019-2020 lottery is available now. Click on the My School DC link on the left to complete an application.
Click here to learn more about our tier one program.

div.class: sqs-svg-icon--outer social-icon-alignment-center social-icons-color-white social-icons-size-large social-icons-shape-circle social-icons-style-knockout

div.h3: 4300 C STREET, SE | WASHINGTON, D.C. 20019 | MAIN: (202) 248-7773
